markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rope Runner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2034) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 185 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Pirate](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=70)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1); Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3); [Pirate Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2032)

</column>

---

You run and climb across ropes and rigging almost as easily as on the ground. You gain a climb Speed of 15 feet, but only on ship's rigging or similar ropes. Whenever you succeed at an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) a rope or an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) on a rope, you get a critical success instead. You aren't [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) while Climbing or Balancing on a rope.
name: Rope Runner
prerequisite: Trained in Acrobatics; Trained in Athletics; Pirate Dedication

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 4" pfs="Standard" > Rope Runner Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 185 2.0 Archetype Pirate Prerequisites Trained in Acrobatics; Trained in Athletics; Pirate Dedication --- You run and climb across ropes and rigging almost as easily as on the ground. You gain a climb Speed of 15 feet, but only on ship's rigging or similar ropes. Whenever you succeed at an Athletics check to Climb a rope or an Acrobatics check to Balance on a rope, you get a critical success instead. You aren't flat-footed while Climbing or Balancing on a rope.
